task: Fix Appearance section not showing in Safari/Brave browsers
message: Fixed dark mode toggle not showing in Safari/Brave. The theme buttons were wrapped in {mounted && (...)} which caused them to not render until hydration. Changed to always render buttons but disable until mounted. Production live with commit 500e648.

deployed_changes.summary: Fix Appearance section not showing in Safari/Brave
features: Theme toggle buttons now always render (not conditionally)
Buttons disabled with opacity-50 cursor-wait until hydrated
Works consistently across Chrome, Safari, and Brave

key_decisions: Changed from {mounted && (...)} conditional rendering to always render with disabled state
Added visual feedback (opacity-50 cursor-wait) while loading
